message: Does anyone have any cravings?  I have a chocolate craving that just peeks its ugly head every night at 8 pm.  Suggestions?
Allow yourself dark chocolate... on one of the meal plans, Lindsey even includes chocolate chips as a dessert... "let each one melt in your mouth". Just don't go nuts.
@scrappyshel ohh, I forgot to say that I can NOT have chocolate....stupid doctors LOL
That is just not nice.... are you allergic?

I have intense chocolate cravings in the evening too.  Drinking a protein shake does the trick.  Nutribiotic and Vega are good vegan brands.  I also like to chew Extra's Dessert gums.  Mint chocolate chip (just flavor not really chocolate), Apple Pie, Orange Sherbert, Key LIme Pie, Strawberry Shortcake...they really do taste like the real thing.

I love to have a chocolate green smoothie or my favortie is choc. banana ice cream. just freeze a banana then break it in pieces, put it in the food processor or blender with a little almond milk and cocoa powder and blend until it makes a soft serve ice cream. Or I like chocolate oatmeal.
@mtns ohh Thank you!  That sounds yummy!
